mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goods_id AS "goods.id", a.spec1 AS "spec1", a.spec2 AS "spec2", a.price AS "price", a.sort AS "sort", a.stock AS "stock", a.market_price AS "marketPrice", a.settlement_price AS "settlementPrice", a.profit AS "profit", a.discount AS "discount", a.profit_discount AS "profitDiscount", a.settlement_discount AS "settlementDiscount"
LEFT JOIN s_goods b ON b.id = a.goods_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_goods_sku( id, goods_id, spec1, spec2, price, sort, stock, market_price, settlement_price, profit, discount, settlement_discount ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{goods.id}, #{spec1}, #{spec2}, #{price}, #{sort}, #{stock}, #{marketPrice}, #{settlementPrice}, #{profit}, #{discount}, #{settlementDiscount} )
